item.name: Shortbow (UA)
item.text: Mastery (Vex, Prerequisite: Ammunition, Finesse, or Light Property): If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage to the creature, you have Advantage on your next attack roll against that creature before the end of your next turn.
Source: Unearthed Arcana: Player's Handbook Playtest 8 p. 21
